name: Sick Day (SugarySweet)
description:
You play as Fafnir, who's just getting  over a very nasty cold and is still not feeling great.  Xer brother has left xem some chores to do, but whether or not xey have the energy to do them is up for debate.

My first game! It's very short, at max 5 minutes, and has 3 endings.
